languages.text: {n}Идира cо стерильной учтивостью наклоняет голову, стараясь не встречаться с вами взглядом.{/n} "Лорд-капитан?"
{n}Idira inclines her head with sterile courtesy, trying not to meet your gaze.{/n} "Lord Captain?"

languages.text: {n}Idira inclina la cabeza con cortesía e indolencia, procurando no mirarte a los ojos.{/n} «¿Lord Capitán?».
languages.original_text: {n}Idira inclines her head with sterile courtesy, trying not to meet your gaze.{/n} "Lord Captain?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira inclina la cabeza con cortesía e indolencia, procurando no mirarte a los ojos.{/n} «¿Lord Capitán?».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}イディラは清潔な礼儀正しさで頭をもたげ、こちらと視線を合わせないようにしている。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン？」
languages.original_text: {n}Idira inclines her head with sterile courtesy, trying not to meet your gaze.{/n} "Lord Captain?"

traits.locale_text: {n}イディラは清潔な礼儀正しさで頭をもたげ、こちらと視線を合わせないようにしている。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン？」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}伊迪拉恭敬地低下头，尽量避开你的目光。{/n}“舰长大人？”
languages.original_text: {n}Idira inclines her head with sterile courtesy, trying not to meet your gaze.{/n} "Lord Captain?"

traits.locale_text: {n}伊迪拉恭敬地低下头，尽量避开你的目光。{/n}“舰长大人？”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idira incline la tête dans un geste de courtoisie futile en évitant de croiser votre regard.{/n} « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine} ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Idira inclines her head with sterile courtesy, trying not to meet your gaze.{/n} "Lord Captain?"

languages.text: {n}Idira neigt mit steriler Höflichkeit den Kopf, bemüht, dich nicht direkt anzusehen.{/n} "Lord Captain?"
languages.original_text: {n}Idira inclines her head with sterile courtesy, trying not to meet your gaze.{/n} "Lord Captain?"

languages.text: {n}İdira, beyhude bir nezaketle başını eğiyor. Seninle göz göze gelmemeye çalışıyor.{/n} "Lord Kaptan?"
